you didnt answer right the question
The goal of the game is to solve the equation at the fastest time, in order to improve the player\'s skill in a fun way.

To start playing, press the "Play" button. Solve the equation as quick as possible by entering the answer next to the "X=", and press the "Solved!" Button. 
 After solving the equation, the game will present a new equation after 5 seconds.
 In the game you are allowed to do what is needed in order to solve the equation. 
 The game is for a single player. 
 Audiance is 7th grade studants and above.
